bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: U.S. Army private during Civil War; Company B, 5th Infantry, California Volunteers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph diary of Civil War service from his swearing in at Sacramento, Calif., Oct. 8, 1861 to May 15, 1864; pages are missing until a notation on Dec. 6, 1864 when he was mustered out, then a record of trip from Franklin, Tex., Nov. 6, 1865 to Sacramento, Dec. 6, 1865.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material at Diary of Alexander Grayson Bowman (AZ 001).
